welcome.title: Welcome to LyricSync
welcome.signIn: Sign in to save your setlists, sync across devices, and unlock all features!
welcome.desc: Your ultimate tool to organize songs, build setlists, and enjoy playing music.
welcome.descShort: Your setlist and song management assistant
welcome.welcomeText: Organize songs, create setlists, and enjoy playing music for every occasion. Easy to use solo or in a team, catering to all music genres and user groups.
welcome.feature1Desc: Instantly find songs from our cloud library or add your own. Supports both Thai and international music with an intuitive search.
welcome.feature2Desc: Create and manage custom setlists for performances or practice sessions. Freely add, remove, and reorder songs with ease.
welcome.feature3Desc: A player built for live performance, featuring auto-scrolling lyrics, real-time chord display, and on-the-fly key transposition.
welcome.feature4Desc: Effortlessly share setlists with your team members via a simple link, ensuring everyone is on the same page.
welcome.howToInstall: How to Install on Your Home Screen
welcome.installAppDesc: Add this app to your home screen for quick access and a full offline experience.

profile.title: Profile
profile.unlockDesc: Sign in with Google to save your songs, create setlists, and sync your data across devices.
profile.publicProfileDesc: Allow other users to see your profile and public setlists.

search.title: Search
search.placeholder: Search songs, artists, and public setlists...

explore.title: Explore Setlists
explore.description: Discover setlists shared by the LyricSync community.
explore.descriptionUsers: Discover other users and their shared setlists.
explore.noPublicSetlists: This user has no public setlists yet.

donate.title: Support LyricSync
donate.desc: Your support directly fuels the development and hosting of LyricSync, keeping it free for everyone. Thank you for being a part of our journey!
donate.promptpayAlt: PromptPay QR Code for LyricSync donation
donate.copiedDesc: Account number {bankAccountNumber} has been copied to your clipboard.

longDesc: LyricSync helps you organize songs, create setlists, and enjoy playing music for any occasion. It features an auto-scrolling player, chord management, and easy sharing for everyone.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

setlist.title: Setlists
setlist.noSetlistsDesc: You haven't created or saved any setlists yet.
setlist.syncLimitReachedDesc: You can only sync up to {limit} setlists online.
setlist.deleteDialogDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your setlist "{title}".
setlist.removeDialogDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove the setlist "{title}" from your library.
setlist.linkCopiedToastDesc: A shareable link has been copied to your clipboard.
setlist.savedToLibraryToastDesc: "{title}" has been saved to your setlists.
setlist.emptySetlist: This setlist is empty or the songs could not be loaded.

shareSetlist.title: Share "{title}"
shareSetlist.desc: Use the link to share this setlist, or make it public for others to discover.
shareSetlist.publicSwitchDesc: Allow other users to find and use this setlist.
shareSetlist.linkCopiedToastDesc: The shareable link has been copied to your clipboard.
shareSetlist.nowPublicToastDesc: Other users can now find and use this setlist.
shareSetlist.nowPrivateToastDesc: This setlist is no longer publicly searchable.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyDesc: You don't have any notifications yet.

updates.title: Updates
updates.emptyDesc: You currently have no new updates or news from the system.
